titleInfo.title: Photomontage of Vanderbilt Hospital and University staff and students, with one large ad. Nashville Banner, 1926 April 11.

mods.abstract: Photomontage of Vanderbilt Hospital and University staff and students, with one large ad. Pictured are the hospital, an operating room, a classroom in the West Side Row dormitories, the Science Hall, Neely Auditorium, two young people who appeared in a movie, a track meet and a campus watchman. 16 x 21.5 in. Forms part of the Nashville Newspaper Rotogravure Digital Images Collection.

originInfo.publisher: Metropolitan Nashville/Davidson County Archives, Nashville Public Library

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Record has been transformed into MODS 3.5 from a Qualified Dublin Core record by the Digital Library of Tennessee, a service hub of the Digital Public Library of America, using a stylesheet available at https://github.com/digitallibraryoftennessee/DLTN_XSLT.
